display.title: 3fe
display.description:
3fe has the best coffee in Dublin, no place for discussion. I like stopping here before going in a road trip for the morning boost. The coffee is so strong and tastes so powerful. Sometimes I don't even need sugar, I just love tasting the full aroma.

They also have some brunch options, I've tried one and it was a failure. I recommend you play safe, with yogurt and granola, scone or banana loaf, all delicous.
